item.title: Street lights not working with correct times, 18th January
item.description:
The street lights are not working for the whole night in Arlington N12, except outside numbers 2 and 6. It appears that the time clocks are wrong. The lights were on at 9.30pm but not at 6.30am
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Arlington, Woodside Park, Greater London

item.title: Large pot hole on the road near pavement, 17th January
item.description:
I'm a residents living at 26 West street. When a car passes over the pot hole it splashes water all over of my front house and window. I have a new born baby and it is very difficult to push the buggy out of my house. This is very serious & dangerous for the residents because the street is very narrow and i noticed some cars go very fast & don't realise this large pot holes out side my house. This could cause a serious accident for the public and residents. This pot hole only appeared around a week ago or since the cold weather recently. I would be greatful if you could come and fix this pot hole as soon as possible. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Street, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Slippery leaves on path to station, 17th January
item.description:
